name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course provides an English-speaking environment for students to develop their fluency in English through examining various issues related to their real-life situations. Students will engage in discussions, conversations, role plays, and presentations in which they share their own knowledge and experiences of these issues. They are also expected to notice differences and similarities between American culture and their native culture through learning how these issues are viewed in the United States.
